channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta unveils AI tools to give robots a human touch in physical world
item.description: Meta unveils three tools and benchmarks to enhance robot touch perception, dexterity, and human-robot collaboration in real-world settings.

item.title: DevRev raises $100.8 million in Series A funding and becomes an AI unicorn at a $1.15 billion valuation
item.description: Following its successful Series A funding, DevRev drives forward its mission to revolutionize customer support and product development.

item.title: My boyfriend struggled to come up with a down payment when we bought our house. I have $50K in investments. Was I wrong to keep this to myself?
item.description: “I could have cashed out my investments to get us closer to a 20% down payment.”

item.title: Here’s why some NBA teams show their games on TV for free, while others charge fans hundreds of dollars
item.description: NBA owners have very different ideas about the benefits of showing their teams’ games for free.

item.title: ‘I became very frugal’: My husband and I are 40. I have $200,000 in student debt, while he has $600,000 in retirement savings. Are we in trouble?
item.description: “Neither of us will have an inheritance and everything we have, we built together.”

item.title: ‘I have the father-in-law from hell’: He stole my late husband’s savings — and took ownership of our home. What can I do?
item.description: “Law enforcement says they can’t prove that he forged signatures, so no charges can be filed.”
